name: Daydreaming: in two dreams
description:
A simple puzzle-platformer.
I'll be fixing the above glitches and polishing some art ASAP.

Thanks for playing!

Controls (keyboard only):
Arrows: move
Space: jump
Shift or Control: switch beteween dreams
TAB restart room
*Into the second dream (blue shades) you cand perform a double jump*
